course.subject: MATH
course.name: Independent Study: Numerical Study of Partial Differential Equations
course.description: The course covers topics that will allow students to get familiar with finite difference, finite volume for the solution of elliptic, parabolic and hyperbolic partial differential equations; related numerical analysis and iterative methods. Students should seek the course instructor's approval to take this course.
course.prerequisites: MATH 2023 AND MATH 2121 AND MATH 2351
